sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import Navigator from '../components/Navigator' import Footer from '../components/Footer' import { Container, ImageContainer, FormContainer, FormTitle, Form, FormSelector, FormPlatform, FormDescription } from './HomeStyles' import Steam from '../images/steam.svg' import Psn from '../images/playstation.svg' import Xbox from '../images/xbox.svg' export default function Home(props) { const [platform, setPlatform] = useState('steam') const [steamActive, setSteamActive] = useState(true) const [psnActive, setPsnActive] = useState(false) const [xboxActive, setXboxActive] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { switch(platform) { case 'steam': setSteamActive(true) setPsnActive(false) setXboxActive(false) break case 'psn': setSteamActive(false) setPsnActive(true) setXboxActive(false) break case 'xbox': setSteamActive(false) setPsnActive(false) setXboxActive(true) break default: setSteamActive(true) setPsnActive(false) setXboxActive(false) } }, [platform]) const handleClick = path => { props.history.push(`/leaderboards/${path}`) } const handlePlatformChange = e => { setPlatform(e) console.log(platform) } return ( PlayersUnknown's Battleground Stats Viewer
handlePlatformChange('psn')}> Playstation Network Username handlePlatformChange('xbox')}> Xbox Live Username handlePlatformChange('steam')}> Steam Username
) }
